com.joliciel.talismane

Interface AnnotatedCorpusReader

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LanguageDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader, ParserAnnotatedCorpusReader, ParserRegexBasedCorpusReader, PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader, PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader, SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader, TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader, TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FtbDepReader, ParserRegexBasedCorpusReaderImpl, PennDepReader, StandoffReader

    public interface AnnotatedCorpusReader

      int getMaxSentenceCount()
      If 0, all sentences will be read - otherwise will only read a certain number of sentences.

      The index of the first sentence to process.
      void setCrossValidationSize(int crossValidationSize)
      The number of cross-validation segments for this corpus.
      void setExcludeIndex(int excludeIndex)
      Which index to exclude when reading (for training), from 0 to getCrossValidationSize-1.
      void setIncludeIndex(int includeIndex)
      Which index to include when reading (for evaluation), from 0 to getCrossValidationSize-1.

      void setStartSentence(int startSentence)
